name: Death Guy
description:
Deathguys are seeking revenge! Join the deathsquad and help them survive.

Warning! Don’t touch the erasers. If you touch them, you’ll disappear forever. Collect as many coins as possible and customize your Deathguy!

How to play:
-Smartphone: tilt the device to move left or right!
-Keyboard: Click A or the left arrow to move left and click D or the right arrow to move right.
-Gamepad: Left Stick Left or Right Stick Left or D-PAD Left to move left, Left Stick Rigt or Right Stick Right or D-PAD Right to move right.
